title: Find the Period
text: For the standard cosecant function $$f(x)=Acsc(Bx-C)$$, the period is $$\frac{2\pi}{|B|}$$. So $$T=\frac{2\pi}{1}=2$$

title: Find the Horizontal Shift
text: For the standard cosecant function $$f(x)=Acsc(Bx-C)$$, the phase shift is $$\frac{C}{B}$$. So $$h=\frac{\frac{\pi}{4}}{1}=\frac{\pi}{4}$$.
